data.title: Stellar service
data.text: Stopped in at this tasting room on my first night in Napa. Rebecca was so helpful and knowledgeable about about the numerous wineries in the valley. The ambiance and vibe were very relaxed and I felt free to ask her all my ridiculous questions. She made us feel comfortable in her town while educating us. Stop in for the local information. The wines are phenomenal!

data.title: Pleasant service, okay wine
data.text: Hearing this was one of the older established wineries with Old World flavor, we were interested!  The wines in the tasting were a bit light - not as full flavored as we expected.  The exception was the cab - which was FABULOUS!!  Wish we had more of just this one wine.  $20 per person - about average for the area.

data.title: Great wine tasting and great company.
data.text: Thank you to Dan for an interesting hour and a half tasting 6 stunning wines and conversation that was varied and interesting. If you want to taste some quality wines, this is a highly recommended spot from me. And Dan is great, knowledgable and so interesting

data.title: Really, really good cabs and merlots.
data.text: The wines were fantastic. Our hotel provided us with a BOGO wine tasting coupon, meaning both of us tasted 4 wines for $20. At the end of the tasting they made us an offer we couldn't refuse... buy two bottles and the tasting is free. The wines were $30ish per bottle.

data.title: Very enjoyable wine tasting experience
data.text:
We visited the Capp Heritage Vineyards in Napa during a short wine tasting trip to Sonoma and Napa.   There we met Rebecca Capp, "The Vintner's Daughter" who guided us through a thoroughly enjoyable wine tasting session.  Tasting room is decorated with elaborate wood  crown moulding and other polished woodwork through out and sprinkled with antiques including an old cash register.  Directly adjacent to the tasting room is the "Deco Lounge" which includes many art deco pieces and hosts evening musical events.  Guests can purchase wine and listen to music for a very enjoyable evening.  

Rebecca Capp told us stories of her father and the making of the tasting room.  She was very engaging and we had a wonderful time meeting her.
